DOC.brief_summary: This Phase Ib pilot RCT examine safety , feasibility , acceptability multi-component intervention address traumatic stress symptom among HIV-positive , methamphetamine-using men sex men ( MSM ) . Following baseline assessment , 56 participant randomize receive either : 1 ) 7-session intervention address traumatic stress relate living HIV/AIDS ; 2 ) 7-session , attention-control condition . Follow-up assessment administer 1 3 month post-randomization .
